content:
Apple revealed the first of its M1 processors back in 2020. Since then, the company has been slowly adopting them on its Mac lineup — ditching Intel chips in the process. description: Apple finally revealed the Mac Studio during its Peek Performance event. Here's everything we know about this desktop computer.
